ValidationRule.description: Support Level & GMV not available for PCI Proxy & Payment Gateway Products
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(Click_Collect__c = TRUE || OMS__c = TRUE || Smart_POS__c = TRUE || Digital_Commerce__c = TRUE), IF(PCI_Proxy__c = TRUE || Payment_Gateway__c = TRUE, NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Support_Level__c))) || NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Predicted_GMV_Value__c))) , FALSE) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Support Level & GMV Values are not supported for PCI Proxy & Payment Gateway Product
